CHEP.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company "Chelyabinsk Pipe-Rolling Plant"
CHEP.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Chelyabinsk Pipe Plant produces and sells welded and seamless steel pipe products for fuel and energy industries in Russia. The company operates through four segments: Steel Pipe Production, Oilfield Services, Trunk Pipeline Systems, and Scrap Procurement. It offers casings, tubing, boiler tubes, cold-finished and hot-finished pipes and tubes, small-diameter welded pipes, and stainless steel pipes; pipeline transport; and high pressure pumps. The company pipeline fittings, which include tee, elbow, reducer, cap, split tees, cold and hot induction bends, and 3D bends products. In addition, it offers ball, bellows-type globe, check, globe, and swing check valves; electrical submersible motors; gas separators and dispersers; surface pumping system; and perforated liner products. It serves oil and gas industry, housing, utilities infrastructure, and industrial applications. It exports its products to the European Union, the Commonwealth of Independent States, North America, the Middle East, and North Africa. The company was founded in 1942 and is based in Chelyabinsk, Russia.

CHKZ.ME.long_name: Chelyabinsk Forge-and-Press Plant, Public Joint Stock Company
CHKZ.ME.summary: Chelyabinsk Forge-and-Press Plant, Public Joint Stock Company operates as a forging company in Russia and internationally. The company offers hot-die forgings and machined parts, cold sheet-metal stampings, flanges, wheels and rims, and special purpose vehicles, as well as finished pipeline fittings. It serves automotive and agriculture industries. The company was founded in 1942 and is based in Chelyabinsk, Russia.

RUSP.ME.summary: Public Joint - Stock Company Ruspolymet manufactures and sells ring blanks and disks primarily in Russia. It manufactures seamless rolled and welded ring blanks and disks for aircraft engine industry, power pants, and general engineering enterprises; and carbon, alloyed, titanium, and heat-resistant steel and alloy ingots for aircraft, power, engineering, and other industries. The company also offers carbon, alloyed, titanium, and heat-resistant steel and alloy forgings; and rolled metal products consisting of profiled bars and section iron, as well as machining services. In addition, it manufactures engines for civil aircraft vehicles; and processes complex alloys, non-magnetic corrosion-resistant steels, carbon and alloyed steels, nickel and titanium alloys, and copper and aluminum alloys. The company was founded in 1866 and is based in Nizhny Novgorod, Russia. Public Joint - Stock Company "Ruspolymet" operates as a subsidiary of Motor-Invest OOO.
